thread.title: Kannada director threatened with rape online
thread.title_full: Kannada director threatened with rape online - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Kannada director threatened with rape online
text:
Kannada film script writer and associate director Chetana Thirathalli filed a complaint in the Hanumanthnagar Police Station recently against people that have been threatening her with killing, raping and attacking her with acid.
Chetana, a feminist, has been a liberal writer for two decades and has previously worked with director B Suresha as a script writer. She is currently the associate director and script writer of Pooja Gandhi's Raavani. After participating in a rally supporting beef eating, Chetana began receiving threats from several people on her Facebook page, some even threatening her that they will rape her in the middle of the road and attack her with acid, apart from killing her.
